# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Creates a color object from color data currently on the pasteboard.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(from pasteBoard: NSPasteboard)
```

## Parameters

- **pasteBoard**: The pasteboard from which to return the color.

## Return Value

The color currently on the pasteboard or `nil` if `pasteBoard` doesn’t contain color data. The returned color’s alpha component is set to 1.0 if [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/ignoresAlpha] returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Copying and pasting color Information

- **write(to:)**: Writes the color object’s data to the specified pasteboard.
